body:
AFAIK, you can add them via edits to the post's body (not sure if you'll get autobanned if the original post contains one, I'll try it out), so there's really no point to doing that.

Edit: Endless Summer https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o_LskiXQ73c

On ruqqus, you have the privilege of getting auto-banned for posting those *mysterious* banned links! And you don't even have to spam it. Just once is enough.

When you get banned, no backstory/context behind the ban is given. Just "Too much spam!"

body:
>not sure if you'll get autobanned if the original post contains one, I'll try it out

Yes, you do, as I had expected. Here are some more Endless Summer links. (This probably is a bug, let me call the admins over (?) (Why am I doing this if I like posting Endless Summer links though? It's fun because of the Streisand Effect or something.))

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o_LskiXQ73c https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o_LskiXQ73c

body_html:
@captainmeta4 You can add Endless Summer links to the body of your post via edits, but you get auto-banned if your original post contains one. Is this intended?

Similarly, for comments, you can add Endless Summer links via edits, but otherwise, it will display this message:

Remove the following link and try again: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o_LskiXQ73c. Reason: Spam

body:
Alright. May I ask why you implemented auto-bans rather than just preventing the link from getting submitted?

I like the way it works for comments better.

Edit: By the way, when I'm suspended, I can vote on posts but not comments. Is this also going to be changed?

And is there a list of banned links or anything?
body_html:

I like the way it works for comments better.

And is there a list of banned links or anything?

body: If you try to edit one of your posts (not your comments) after getting unsuspended, it doesn't work. The body of the post simply disappears. Note that this problem fixes itself if you log out and log back in again.
body_html: If you try to edit one of your posts (not your comments) after getting unsuspended, it doesn't work. The body of the post simply disappears. Note that this problem fixes itself if you log out and log back in again.

body:
Oh no, they said we'll no longer get suspended for posting Endless Summer links. How else will I reach my quota of suspensions on ruqqus? Obvious spam comments, of course!

Edit (2020-12-08): This is a legit coin I swear. (When [my comment](https://ruqqus.com/+GoForCoins/post/5bkz/ruqqus-mascot-redesign-competition/igjp) got tipped, I got ruqqus premium as well as a coin in my balance. Later, I gave \_User a few counterfeit coins (coins obtained from [a bug](https://github.com/ruqqus/ruqqus/commit/4875607204ca11e59ca289119669bcf9846a35b9)), but there weren't any extra coins lying around, so it's ok. I tipped the one I had back to this account.)

![](https://i.ibb.co/MR5FfzB/sfrohne.png)
body_html:
Oh no, they said we'll no longer get suspended for posting Endless Summer links. How else will I reach my quota of suspensions on ruqqus? Obvious spam comments, of course!

Edit (2020-12-08): This is a legit coin I swear. (When my comment got tipped, I got ruqqus premium as well as a coin in my balance. Later, I gave _User a few counterfeit coins (coins obtained from a bug), but there weren't any extra coins lying around, so it's ok. I tipped the one I had back to this account.)

body:
It's fun to treat ruqqus as a game. I've never really wanted to use ruqqus as a site for serious discussion, but rather as a place to try to annoy the users and the admins. (It's true. [I've never actually been against trolls](https://ruqqus.com/post/sfr/negative-rep-club) on this site. I write about "[trolling](https://ruqqus.com/post/3gmt/somehow-i-cant-edit-my-other/cbu0)" and such, but I don't really do it myself)

(That being said, [I've also been kind of lazy](https://ruqqus.com/post/3gmp/making-a-post-in-a-restricted))

In fact, one of my first goals on this site was to get the "Breaker of Ruqqus" title. (I got it within 5 days of creating an account. I don't really have that much motivation to get the other titles though)
body_html:
It's fun to treat ruqqus as a game. I've never really wanted to use ruqqus as a site for serious discussion, but rather as a place to try to annoy the users and the admins. (It's true. I've never actually been against trolls on this site. I write about "trolling" and such, but I don't really do it myself)

(That being said, I've also been kind of lazy)

In fact, one of my first goals on this site was to get the "Breaker of Ruqqus" title. (I got it within 5 days of creating an account. I don't really have that much motivation to get the other titles though)

body:
I like joke suggestions like the ones at /r/IFTACirclejerk, but I'm not sure if ruqqus will like something like that. So I'll just post some joke suggestions here.

1. A button to get suspended (For someone who has never been suspended on reddit, it's fun to get suspended on ruqqus)
2. If your profile is private, you can't view it yourself (I've had to deal with not being able to view my own profile while I was banned. It's unfair ;( )
body_html:
I like joke suggestions like the ones at /r/IFTACirclejerk, but I'm not sure if ruqqus will like something like that. So I'll just post some joke suggestions here.

  1. A button to get suspended (For someone who has never been suspended on reddit, it's fun to get suspended on ruqqus)
  2. If your profile is private, you can't view it yourself (I've had to deal with not being able to view my own profile while I was banned. It's unfair ;( )

parent.body:
It's fun to treat ruqqus as a game. I've never really wanted to use ruqqus as a site for serious discussion, but rather as a place to try to annoy the users and the admins. (It's true. [I've never actually been against trolls](https://ruqqus.com/post/sfr/negative-rep-club) on this site. I write about "[trolling](https://ruqqus.com/post/3gmt/somehow-i-cant-edit-my-other/cbu0)" and such, but I don't really do it myself)

(That being said, [I've also been kind of lazy](https://ruqqus.com/post/3gmp/making-a-post-in-a-restricted))

In fact, one of my first goals on this site was to get the "Breaker of Ruqqus" title. (I got it within 5 days of creating an account. I don't really have that much motivation to get the other titles though)
parent.body_html:
It's fun to treat ruqqus as a game. I've never really wanted to use ruqqus as a site for serious discussion, but rather as a place to try to annoy the users and the admins. (It's true. I've never actually been against trolls on this site. I write about "trolling" and such, but I don't really do it myself)

(That being said, I've also been kind of lazy)

In fact, one of my first goals on this site was to get the "Breaker of Ruqqus" title. (I got it within 5 days of creating an account. I don't really have that much motivation to get the other titles though)

body:
That also being said, these comments do show up in my post history (On reddit, I like to post in "live chat threads", where the comments you make aren't shown in your post history), and they're kind of cluttering it.

Edit (2020-11-05): Woah, https://ruqqus.com/@sfrohne/ works now as well as https://ruqqus.com/@sfrohne/comments/ (with the trailing slashes). This must be huge news.
body_html:
That also being said, these comments do show up in my post history (On reddit, I like to post in "live chat threads", where the comments you make aren't shown in your post history), and they're kind of cluttering it.

Edit (2020-11-05): Woah, https://ruqqus.com/@sfrohne/ works now as well as https://ruqqus.com/@sfrohne/comments/ (with the trailing slashes). This must be huge news.

body:
I got suspended when I tried to post the 18th comment. My account was created on August 18, 2020. (That's over 30 days old)

I made this comment after posting the 16th one: "I've posted 16 of the same comment in a row and I still have not been suspended yet. What is this?"

Edit: Well, they weren't all the same. Some had extra line breaks, but I don't think that would have mattered.
body_html:
I got suspended when I tried to post the 18th comment. My account was created on August 18, 2020. (That's over 30 days old)

I made this comment after posting the 16th one: "I've posted 16 of the same comment in a row and I still have not been suspended yet. What is this?"

Edit: Well, they weren't all the same. Some had extra line breaks, but I don't think that would have mattered.

body: My badges are out of order now (first one I got was Beta User, last was Idea Maker), but at least they're still in a silver-gold pattern. I was just lucky to have earned the first 3 in order of descending ids. If I really wanted to maintain that gold-silver pattern, I can't recruit anyone, and I'd have to either become a Game Night Finalist or get the Artisan badge.
body_html: My badges are out of order now (first one I got was Beta User, last was Idea Maker), but at least they're still in a silver-gold pattern. I was just lucky to have earned the first 3 in order of descending ids. If I really wanted to maintain that gold-silver pattern, I can't recruit anyone, and I'd have to either become a Game Night Finalist or get the Artisan badge.

body:
One of the reasons why [CrystalVulpine](https://ruqqus.com/+general/post/639c/crystalvulpine) is so cool: https://web.archive.org/web/20201226052958/https://ruqqus.com/+HitlerWasRight/mod/log/?page=8

(I have Ruqqus premium so I need to use this image posting feature *somewhere*.)

Edit: https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/post/639a/free-of-moderator-abuse-by-design/l5dr?context=3

![](https://i.ruqqus.com/comment/l60q/ZgGBiYcuHwQ)

***

[And of course JosephGoebbels and those other guys would start exiling users once they got the guild back...](https://web.archive.org/web/20201226081545/https://ruqqus.com/+HitlerWasRight/mod/log/)

***

Also,

>I like CV's content

>I do not like CV as a person

\- Wet_Dishwasher on Discord (Moister Banana#2942)

rip
body_html:
One of the reasons why CrystalVulpine is so cool: https://web.archive.org/web/20201226052958/https://ruqqus.com/+HitlerWasRight/mod/log/?page=8

(I have Ruqqus premium so I need to use this image posting feature somewhere.)

Edit: https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/post/639a/free-of-moderator-abuse-by-design/l5dr?context=3

And of course JosephGoebbels and those other guys would start exiling users once they got the guild back...

Also,

I like CV's content

I do not like CV as a person

- Wet_Dishwasher on Discord (Moister Banana#2942)

rip
